attributes.action: Allow Under 25s to have the same rights as over 25s to claim Support and Employment Allowence
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: This is age discrimnation Mr Gordon Brown. I am currently trying to claim Support and Employment Allowence but because I am under 25 if I haven't had enough sick days in work then I am not entiltled to it. But I am suffering from depression and have been sign off.
